languages.text: "Капитан докладывает, что "Бессердечному" довелось взять на борт группу паломников, застрявших в захолустном звездном порту. Верующие сошли на ближайшем мире-улье, а после слуги нашли в их каютах боеприпасы. Возможно, это были не богомольцы, а наемники или вовсе беглые преступники".

"The captain reports that the Heartless once took aboard a group of pilgrims who had found themselves in an out-of-the-way starport with no means of leaving. After the faithful had been delivered to the nearest hive world, your servants discovered ammunition in the cabins they had been occupying. It seems likely that they were not devotees after all, but rather mercenaries, or even fugitives."
languages.original_text: "Капитан докладывает, что "Бессердечному" довелось взять на борт группу паломников, застрявших в захолустном звездном порту. Верующие сошли на ближайшем мире-улье, а после слуги нашли в их каютах боеприпасы. Возможно, это были не богомольцы, а наемники или вовсе беглые преступники".

traits.locale_text: "The captain reports that the Heartless once took aboard a group of pilgrims who had found themselves in an out-of-the-way starport with no means of leaving. After the faithful had disembarked on the nearest hive world, your servants discovered ammunition in the cabins they had been occupying. It seems possible that they were not devotees after all, but rather mercenaries or even fugitives."

languages.text: 「船長の報告によると、ハートレスはかつて、辺鄙なスターポートで立ち往生していた巡礼者の一団を乗せたことがあるそうです。敬虔な者たちを最寄りの過密惑星へ送り届けた後、あなたの部下は彼らが滞在していた客室で弾薬を発見しました。どうやら彼らは本物の信者ではなく、傭兵か、あるいは逃亡者である可能性が高いようです」
languages.original_text: "The captain reports that the Heartless once took aboard a group of pilgrims who had found themselves in an out-of-the-way starport with no means of leaving. After the faithful had been delivered to the nearest hive world, your servants discovered ammunition in the cabins they had been occupying. It seems likely that they were not devotees after all, but rather mercenaries, or even fugitives."

traits.locale_text: 「船長の報告によると、ハートレスはかつて、辺鄙なスターポートで立ち往生していた巡礼者の一団を乗せたことがあるそうです。敬虔な者たちを最寄りの過密惑星へ送り届けた後、あなたの部下は彼らが滞在していた客室で弾薬を発見しました。どうやら彼らは本物の信者ではなく、傭兵か、あるいは逃亡者である可能性が高いようです」

languages.text: "Kaptan, Taşkalp'in kendilerini hiçbir çıkış yollarının olmadığı bir yıldız limanında bulan bir grup hacıyı gemiye aldığını bildirdi. İnançlılar en yakın kovan dünyasına bırakıldıktan sonra hizmetkârlarınız, hacıların kaldığı kamaralarda cephane bulmuş. Anlaşılan hacılar; zahitten ziyade paralı asker, hatta suçlularmış."
languages.original_text: "The captain reports that the Heartless once took aboard a group of pilgrims who had found themselves in an out-of-the-way starport with no means of leaving. After the faithful had been delivered to the nearest hive world, your servants discovered ammunition in the cabins they had been occupying. It seems likely that they were not devotees after all, but rather mercenaries, or even fugitives."

traits.locale_text: "Kaptan, Taşkalp'in kendilerini hiçbir çıkış yollarının olmadığı bir yıldız limanında bulan bir grup hacıyı gemiye aldığını bildirdi. İnançlılar en yakın kovan dünyasına bırakıldıktan sonra hizmetkârlarınız, hacıların kaldığı kamaralarda cephane bulmuş. Anlaşılan hacılar; zahitten ziyade paralı asker, hatta suçlularmış."

languages.text: «El capitán informa de que la Desalmada acogió a un grupo de peregrinos que habían acabado en un puerto estelar del que no podían salir. Tras entregar a los fieles en el mundo colmena más cercano, sus sirvientes descubrieron munición en los camarotes que habían ocupado. Es probable que no se tratase de un grupo de religiosos, sino mercenarios o posiblemente fugitivos».
languages.original_text: "The captain reports that the Heartless once took aboard a group of pilgrims who had found themselves in an out-of-the-way starport with no means of leaving. After the faithful had been delivered to the nearest hive world, your servants discovered ammunition in the cabins they had been occupying. It seems likely that they were not devotees after all, but rather mercenaries, or even fugitives."

traits.locale_text: «El capitán informa de que la Desalmada acogió a un grupo de peregrinos que habían acabado en un puerto estelar del que no podían salir. Tras entregar a los fieles en el mundo colmena más cercano, sus sirvientes descubrieron munición en los camarotes que habían ocupado. Es probable que no se tratase de un grupo de religiosos, sino mercenarios o posiblemente fugitivos».

languages.text: “无心号的舰长报告说，之前有一群朝圣者上了船。当时，那群人被困在某个偏僻的星港，无法离开，后来无心号把这群忠实的信徒送到了最近的巢都世界。然而，当船员清理那些人在船上的住处时，却在他们的小屋里找到了弹药。看起来，那些人根本不是什么朝圣者，而是雇佣兵，甚至可能是流窜的罪犯。”
languages.original_text: "The captain reports that the Heartless once took aboard a group of pilgrims who had found themselves in an out-of-the-way starport with no means of leaving. After the faithful had been delivered to the nearest hive world, your servants discovered ammunition in the cabins they had been occupying. It seems likely that they were not devotees after all, but rather mercenaries, or even fugitives."

traits.locale_text: “无心号的舰长报告说，之前有一群朝圣者上了船。当时，那群人被困在某个偏僻的星港，无法离开，后来无心号把这群忠实的信徒送到了最近的巢都世界。然而，当船员清理那些人在船上的住处时，却在他们的小屋里找到了弹药。看起来，那些人根本不是什么朝圣者，而是雇佣兵，甚至可能是流窜的罪犯。”

languages.text: "Dem Captain zufolge hat die Heartless einst eine Gruppe von Pilgern an Bord genommen, die auf einem entlegenen Raumhafen gestrandet waren. Nachdem sie die Gläubigen auf der nächstgelegenen Makropolwelt abgesetzt hatten, entdeckten Eure Diener Munition in den Kabinen, die sie bewohnt hatten. Offenbar waren sie also keineswegs Gläubige, sondern Söldner oder sogar flüchtige Verbrecher."
languages.original_text: "The captain reports that the Heartless once took aboard a group of pilgrims who had found themselves in an out-of-the-way starport with no means of leaving. After the faithful had been delivered to the nearest hive world, your servants discovered ammunition in the cabins they had been occupying. It seems likely that they were not devotees after all, but rather mercenaries, or even fugitives."

traits.locale_text: "Dem Captain zufolge hat die Heartless einst eine Gruppe von Pilgern an Bord genommen, die auf einem entlegenen Raumhafen gestrandet waren. Nachdem sie die Gläubigen auf der nächstgelegenen Makropolwelt abgesetzt hatten, entdeckten Eure Diener Munition in den Kabinen, die sie bewohnt hatten. Offenbar waren sie also keineswegs Gläubige, sondern Söldner oder sogar flüchtige Verbrecher."

languages.text: « Le capitaine indique que le Sans-Cœur a recueilli il y a quelque temps un groupe de pèlerins qui s'étaient retrouvés piégés dans un astroport isolé, sans moyen de repartir. Une fois les fidèles débarqués dans le monde ruche le plus proche, vos serviteurs ont découvert des munitions oubliées dans les cabines qu'ils avaient occupées. Il semblerait que ces pèlerins n'en étaient pas vraiment, et qu'il s'agissait probablement en vérité de mercenaires, voire de fugitifs. »
languages.original_text: "The captain reports that the Heartless once took aboard a group of pilgrims who had found themselves in an out-of-the-way starport with no means of leaving. After the faithful had been delivered to the nearest hive world, your servants discovered ammunition in the cabins they had been occupying. It seems likely that they were not devotees after all, but rather mercenaries, or even fugitives."
